description: Lists the latest analytics data for controls within a specific control domain and a specific active assessment.

parameters.name: controlDomainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the control domain. Audit Manager supports the control domains that are provided by Amazon Web Services Control Catalog. For information about how to find a list of available control domains, see ListDomains in the Amazon Web Services Control Catalog API Reference.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the active assessment.

nested_items.name: controlInsightsByAssessment
nested_items.description: The assessment control analytics data that the ListAssessmentControlInsightsByControlDomain API returned.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment control.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the assessment control.

nested_items.name: evidenceInsights
nested_items.description: A breakdown of the compliance check status for the evidence that's associated with the assessment control.

nested_items.name: noncompliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as non-compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Fail ruling, or collected from Config with a Non-compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: compliantEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of compliance check evidence that Audit Manager classified as compliant. This includes evidence that was collected from Security Hub with a Pass ruling, or collected from Config with a Compliant ruling.

nested_items.name: inconclusiveEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that a compliance check ruling isn't available for. Evidence is inconclusive when the associated control uses Security Hub or Config as a data source but you didn't enable those services. This is also the case when a control uses a data source that doesn't support compliance checks (for example, manual evidence, API calls, or CloudTrail).

nested_items.name: controlSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the control set that the assessment control belongs to.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time when the assessment control insights were last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
